overview: What do you do when life takes you out of the familiar, out of your comfort zone?  In Living With Restrictions, T.D. Jakes teaches us that oftentimes the solutions to challenges are given to us through life's most difficult times. T.D Jakes shares lessons that will inspire and motivate... find your inner strength and empowerment to make positive changes in your life today! Step out of your comfort zone and experience life's rewards through honesty, truth and faith.
title: T.D Jakes: Living with Restrictions
